issue.title: [C++][FlightRPC] Refactor and split up Flight tests
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15707](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15707). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should split out Flight tests that don't actually spin up a server/client from ones that do for anticipated work in ARROW-15282. Also hopefully this will make things a little faster to compile since flight_test.cc is extremely large/slow to compile.
